articles.content: Mr Hancock feels a certain degree of justification for his support of the second national lockdown and his faith in a vaccine to chart the course of the UK and the world  out of the coronavirus crisi… [+2040 chars]

articles.author: Fiona Thompson
articles.title: More than 70 new coronavirus cases in Northumberland as five more virus deaths are confirmed at hospital trust - Northumberland Gazette
articles.description: A further 56 new coronavirus cases have been confirmed in Northumberland, with no rise reported in the number of deaths at its hospital trust.
articles.content:
According to NHS England, a further 195 people, who tested positive for Covid-19 have died, bringing the total number of confirmed reported deaths in hospitals in England to 42,389.
Patients were ag… [+1105 chars]
